name: Godo
description:
《Godo 》is an adventure puzzle game.
The hero had an accident a year earlier during his adventure in "The Place,"
Injured left leg and unable to walk normally.
After a year of loss and bewilderment,
One day suddenly wake up, unexpectedly miraculously recovered.
Gu Dong decided to go back to "that place" again to find the truth.
So began a new round of adventure........
There are currently three major themes, each with 16 zones (levels)
Each area contains information related to starting the next topic
Work hard to find pieces of information and solve the final puzzle~~
